title: Boutique Barefoot Thailand Villa Escape
description:
Experience the best of Thai beachfront bliss with an escape to the exclusive Haadtien Beach Resort, on postcard-perfect Koh Tao island. Surrounded by palm groves and jungle-clad hills on the southern tip of the island, this boutique luxury resort enjoys exclusive access to the secluded white sands and turquoise waters of Shark Bay. Home to some of the island’s best snorkelling, as well as a PADI dive centre, it’s an underwater explorer’s heaven.

Nature lovers will find plenty to delight among Haadtien Beach Resort’s facilities - start the day at inSea Bar & Grill for breakfast, before retiring to the white-sand beach or ocean-view infinity pool to laze away the day on a wicker-style lounger. When thirst strikes, turn to the Beach Bar or return to open-air, ocean-view inSea for lunch or dinner featuring Thai classics. Take a breather at Tien Spa with tranquil treatments by expert therapists - or, for an exciting alternative, make a beeline to the in-house dive centre, where staff can organise a variety of underwater adventures.
offer_address: 19/9 3 Ko Tao, Ko Pha-ngan District, Surat Thani 84360, Thailand
